bug.author: RenJinan
bug.summary: A bug in audio related task
bug.description:
Describe the bug In the audio task, when I click the audio waveform, the audio playing pointer does not move to the position of my mouse pointer, resulting in that every time I want to listen to a part in the middle, I always listen from the beginning. To Reproduce
Go to 'labeling' Click on waveform See error that the audio playing pointer does not move to the position of my mouse pointer
Expected behavior the audio playing pointer move to the position of my mouse pointer. Environment:
OS: Windows 10 Browser: chrome Version: 0.7.0
Additional context This problem does not exist in the ’interface preview‘ in the ‘Setup’, but it will appear when labeling.
